channel.title: 317 Karma's Retribution
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i47.tinypic.com/1zd4sxl.png[/img]
[url=http://karmasretribution.com/forums/webclient.php][img]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u320/12368146/playnav-Copy.png[/img][/url] [url=http://karmasretribution.com/forums/][img]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u320/12368146/forumsnav-Copy.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWe2n9XGllSfsF0beDBz5Aw?feature=mhee][img]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u320/12368146/youtubenav-Copy.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u320/12368146/whatis-1.png[/img]
[b]Karma's Retribution is a brand new 317 RSPS that's main focus will be on Community. Here we strive to create a home for everyone and we'd like Karma's Retribution to be everyones final stay.[/b]
[img]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u320/12368146/Community.png[/img]
[b]Community to us means family, clan, democracy, and basically keeping the players Entertained/Happy. Here on Karma's Retribution, all suggestions and decisions are brought to the players, everything said by a player is considered top priority. However, the staff are here to make the tough decisions, so dont complain if you didn't get what you wanted. We try our best to keep the all players happy. [/b]
[img]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u320/12368146/features.png[/img]
[b]-Daily/Weekly Community Events -Friendly, Loyal and Motivated Staff -A Variety of Bosses -A Variety of PvM Areas -Basic Pking Locations -Player and Teleport Panels -Kiln Cape, Ganodermic, Polypore Staff, Completionist, and Max Capes
Hope To See You In-Game! -Karma's Retribution Staff Team[/b]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2d6r6li.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/901xck.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2cwr8yh.png[/img]
[img]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u320/12368146/telepanel-1.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u320/12368146/playerpanel-1.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u320/12368146/skills-1.jpg[/img] [/center]

item.title: 317 Karma's Retribution
item.dc:creator: @fright_of_me1 fright_of_me
item.description:
@fright_of_me1 wrote:

[center]

Karma’s Retribution is a brand new 317 RSPS that’s main focus will be on Community. Here we strive to create a home for everyone and we’d like Karma’s Retribution to be everyones final stay.

Community to us means family, clan, democracy, and basically keeping the players Entertained/Happy. Here on Karma’s Retribution, all suggestions and decisions are brought to the players, everything said by a player is considered top priority. However, the staff are here to make the tough decisions, so dont complain if you didn’t get what you wanted. We try our best to keep the all players happy.

[b]-Daily/Weekly Community Events
-Friendly, Loyal and Motivated Staff
-A Variety of Bosses
-A Variety of PvM Areas
-Basic Pking Locations
-Player and Teleport Panels
-Kiln Cape, Ganodermic, Polypore Staff, Completionist, and Max Capes

Hope To See You In-Game!
-Karma’s Retribution Staff Team[/b]

2d6r6li.jpg819×538

901xck.png819×541

2cwr8yh.png819×543


[/center]
